channel.title: How?
channel.description:
Alrite, i want to make a pot that will actually change the level permanent...
Look at this.
[img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/4464/94magemk1.png[/img] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/2954/94magepotfq1.png[/img]
The top one shows the current mage level, how i want it.
The second pic shows when i potted..
Now, when i drink a pot, how do i make it so, the top and the bottom mage level, go back down to a certain level like 20?..
94 Mage. /-Drink pot-/ 20 Mage.
Thats perm level...

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:

Now, when i drink a pot, how do i make it so, the top and the bottom mage level, go back down to a certain level like 20?..

Read full topic
